divs: sighting detailsi was hanging out with friends, six of us in total. we were discussing religion & i just happened to look up & i seen a brownish-orange, cigar-shaped ufo with windows on the side of it. you can see light inside the object & it gave off a funny haze\glow that was a neon green in color. the object wasving in a straight path but was panning left to right like a dial on a meter. it had no faa lights. i was surprised & confused at the same time. all 6 of us lost sight of the object when it passed over a building. when i first saw it i thought it was a blimp as well as the others. we realized that no blimps fly that high & blimps make a humming noise. this object was silent. its glow was also something that made all of us think it wasn't a blimp. i have spoken to lillian waters about this sighting in the kgra chat room & was encouraged to file this report.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around September 7th 2007
